name: Meltan

evolution.description: Meltan can evolve into Melmetal at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 16 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Hex Nut Pokémon. It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.description: Steel opponents in battle with this Pokémon may not switch out or flee.
